CodeList.Name: Gastrointestinal Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: A terminology codelist based on the test codes for physiological findings related to the gastrointestinal system.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A quantitative measurement of an organ's ability to deform in response to physiological force and return to its normal shape by passive elastic recoil.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Rectal Tumor to Anal Verge Distance
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A measurement of the distance between the rectal tumor and the anal margin.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Rectal Tumor to Anal Verge Distance

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Gastrointestinal Test Code Terminology
